summary: Build a prompt library app and populate it with high-quality AI prompts organized by category (video, photo, ads, social media).

existing_features.title: Persist the 30 new prompts in the canister so they are returned by getAllPrompts and appear in the prompt library on the frontend. The addition must be idempotent (re-running the addition logic must not create duplicates).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 30 high-quality AI prompts across video, photo, ads, and social media; persist them and display them in the prompt library.

Create 30 new high-quality AI prompt records in English across the following backend prompt categories: videoGeneration (video), photoGeneration (photo), cgiAds (ads), and socialMedia (social media). Each prompt must include: title, description, fullText, tags[], and boolean flags isPopular, isNew, isPremium.

projectName: Add 30 new prompts (Video, Photo, Ads, Social Media) and show them in the Prompt Library
